trans-unit.resname: ONC·1 | Ixhel, Scion of Atraxa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ixhel, Scion of Atraxa

trans-unit.resname: ONC·1 | Ixhel, Scion of Atraxa | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, toxic 2

trans-unit.resname: ONC·1 | Ixhel, Scion of Atraxa | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Corrupted — At the beginning of your end step, each opponent who has three or more poison counters exiles the top card of their library face down. You may look at and play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
trans-unit.target: 腐化～在你的结束步骤开始时，每位具有三个或更多中毒指示物的对手各牌面朝下地放逐其牌库顶牌。于这些牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并使用之，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放这些咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·2 | Neyali, Suns' Vanguard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Neyali, Suns' Vanguard

trans-unit.resname: ONC·2 | Neyali, Suns' Vanguard | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking tokens you control have double strike.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且进行攻击的衍生物具有连击异能。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·2 | Neyali, Suns' Vanguard | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more tokens you control attack a player, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with a token, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个衍生物攻击任一牌手时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。于你以衍生物攻击过的回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·3 | Otharri, Suns' Glory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Otharri, Suns' Glory

trans-unit.resname: ONC·3 | Otharri, Suns' Glory | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink, haste

trans-unit.resname: ONC·3 | Otharri, Suns' Glory | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Otharri, Suns' Glory attacks, you get an experience counter. Then create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token that's tapped and attacking for each experience counter you have.
trans-unit.target: 每当五阳荣光欧萨利攻击时，你得到一个经验指示物。然后你每有一个经验指示物，便派出一个2/2红色反抗军衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·3 | Otharri, Suns' Glory | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}{W}, Tap an untapped Rebel you control: Return Otharri from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}{W}，横置一个由你操控且未横置的反抗军：将欧萨利从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·4 | Vishgraz, the Doomhive | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vishgraz, the Doomhive

trans-unit.resname: ONC·4 | Vishgraz, the Doomhive | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Menace, toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑，下毒1（受此生物战斗伤害的牌手还会得到一个中毒指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: ONC·4 | Vishgraz, the Doomhive | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Vishgraz, the Doomhive enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature tokens with toxic 1 and "This creature can't block."
trans-unit.target: 当末日繁生威袭瑰进战场时，派出三个1/1无色非瑞人／虫械衍生神器生物，且具有下毒1与「此生物不能进行阻挡。」

trans-unit.resname: ONC·4 | Vishgraz, the Doomhive | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Vishgraz gets +1/+1 for each poison counter your opponents have.
trans-unit.target: 你的所有对手每有一个中毒指示物，威袭瑰便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Any number of target nonland permanents you control phase out. (Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

Flying, first strike Whenever a commander you control enters the battlefield or attacks, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls deal combat damage to you, that opponent gets a poison counter. Whenever a player attacks, if one or more players being attacked are poisoned, the attacking player draws a card.

trans-unit.resname: ONC·10 | Staff of the Storyteller | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Staff of the Storyteller enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Whenever you create one or more creature tokens, put a story counter on Staff of the Storyteller. {W}, {T}, Remove a story counter from Staff of the Storyteller: Draw a card.

Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Corrupted — For each opponent who has three or more poison counters as you cast this spell, put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Each opponent gets a poison counter. Then each creature your opponents control gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each poison counter its controller has.
"It is amusing that the fleshlings believe we are at war. In truth, they are nothing but scurrying pests to be eradicated."\n—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

Affinity for Equipment (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Equipment you control.) Create five 2/2 red Rebel creature tokens. They gain haste until end of turn. For each of those tokens, you may attach an Equipment you control to it.
At Neyali's command, they took position. At Otharri's signal, they struck.

For Mirrodin (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Whenever equipped creature attacks, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap each attacking creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Equip {3}{R}

trans-unit.resname: ONC·15 | Roar of Resistance | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control have haste. Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may pay {1}{R}. If you do, creatures attacking your opponents and/or planeswalkers they control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

{T}: Add {R}. Put a charge counter on Vulshok Factory. {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Vulshok Factory: Create an X/X colorless Golem artifact creature token with haste, where X is the number of charge counters on Vulshok Factory. Activate only as a sorcery.

Trample, toxic 1 Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to one or more players, proliferate. Corrupted — At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent has three or more poison counters, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

Haste, toxic 3 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get three poison counters.) Glissa's Retriever can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Corrupted — When Glissa's Retriever dies, exile it. When you do, return up to X target cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of opponents who have three or more poison counters.

Corrupted — Create an X/X green Phyrexian Wurm creature token with trample and toxic 1, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast this spell. Then for each opponent with three or more poison counters, you create another one of those tokens. Flashback {8}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Glistening Sphere enters the battlefield tapped. When Glistening Sphere enters the battlefield, proliferate. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Corrupted — {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Activate only if an opponent has three or more poison counters.

trans-unit.resname: ONC·21 | Skyhunter Strike Force | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skyhunter Strike Force

trans-unit.resname: ONC·21 | Skyhunter Strike Force | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.resname: ONC·21 | Skyhunter Strike Force | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
trans-unit.target: 乱斗（每当此生物攻击时，本次战斗中每有一位受你攻击的对手，此生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: ONC·21 | Skyhunter Strike Force | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, other creatures you control have melee.
trans-unit.target: 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，由你操控的其他生物便具有乱斗异能。

trans-unit.source: Mirage Mockery

trans-unit.resname: ONC·22 | Mirage Mockery | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —

trans-unit.resname: ONC·22 | Mirage Mockery | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Create a token that's a copy of target artifact creature you control.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控的神器生物之复制品。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·22 | Mirage Mockery | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Create a token that's a copy of target nonartifact creature you control.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控的非神器生物之复制品。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·22 | Mirage Mockery | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Entwine {2}{U} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 打包{2}{U}（如果你支付打包费用，则两项都选。）

trans-unit.source: Synthesis Pod

trans-unit.resname: ONC·23 | Synthesis Pod | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (o can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

trans-unit.resname: ONC·23 | Synthesis Pod | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{PU}, {T}, Exile a spell you control: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a card with mana value equal to 1 plus the exiled spell's mana value. Exile that card, then that player shuffles. You may cast that exiled card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U/P}，{T}，放逐一个由你操控的咒语：目标对手从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值为所放逐咒语之法术力值加1的牌。放逐该牌，然后该牌手洗牌。你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Monumental Corruption
Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为由你操控的神器数量。

trans-unit.source: "Funny, I always thought the Phyrexians were a heartless lot."\n—Kaya
trans-unit.target: 「真有趣，我还以为非瑞克西亚人都没心没肺。」 ～卡娅

trans-unit.resname: ONC·25 | Chiss-Goria, Forge Tyrant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chiss-Goria, Forge Tyrant

trans-unit.resname: ONC·25 | Chiss-Goria, Forge Tyrant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
trans-unit.target: 神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: ONC·25 | Chiss-Goria, Forge Tyrant | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste

trans-unit.resname: ONC·25 | Chiss-Goria, Forge Tyrant | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Chiss-Goria, Forge Tyrant attacks, exile the top five cards of your library. You may cast an artifact spell from among them this turn. If you do, it has affinity for artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 每当熔炉暴君齐歌利攻击时，放逐你牌库顶的五张牌。本回合中，你可以从其中施放一个神器咒语。若你如此作，则它具有神器共鸣异能。

trans-unit.source: Tangleweave Armor

trans-unit.resname: ONC·26 | Tangleweave Armor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)
trans-unit.target: 活化武器（当此武具进战场时，派出一个0/0黑色非瑞人／病菌衍生生物，然后将它贴附于其上。）

trans-unit.resname: ONC·26 | Tangleweave Armor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the greatest mana value among your commanders.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+X/+X，X为你指挥官中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·26 | Tangleweave Armor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Equip {4}
Lux Artillery

trans-unit.resname: ONC·27 | Lux Artillery | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact creature spell, it gains sunburst. (It enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器生物咒语时，它获得辉映异能。（用过几种颜色的法术力来施放它，其进战场时上面便有几个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: ONC·27 | Lux Artillery | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if there are thirty or more counters among artifacts and creatures you control, Lux Artillery deals 10 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若由你操控的神器和生物上总共有三十个或更多个指示物，则光映炮向每位对手各造成10点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·28 | Urtet, Remnant of Memnarch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urtet, Remnant of Memnarch

trans-unit.resname: ONC·28 | Urtet, Remnant of Memnarch | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Myr spell, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放秘耳咒语时，派出一个1/1无色秘耳衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·28 | Urtet, Remnant of Memnarch | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap each Myr you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，重置所有由你操控的秘耳。

trans-unit.resname: ONC·28 | Urtet, Remnant of Memnarch | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Put three +1/+1 counters on each Myr you control. Activate only during your turn.
trans-unit.target: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，{T}：在每个由你操控的秘耳上各放置三个+1/+1指示物。只能于你的回合中起动。
